sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A declaration and vindication of the Lord Mayor, aldermen and commons of the City of London in Common-councell assembled. Ordered at a Common-Councel holden in the chamber of the Guild-hall of the City of London the 30 day of April 1660. that this declaration and vindication be forthwith printed and published. Sadler. City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
[2], 26 p.
Printed by James Flesher, printer to the Honourable City of London, [London] : 1660.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "May 3". Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Goldsmiths' Library, London.
=======

Ordered at a Common-Councel holden in the chamber of the Guild-hall of the City of London the 30 day of April 1660. that this declaration and vindication be forthwith printed and published. Sadler. City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
[2], 26 p.
Printed by James Flesher, printer to the Honourable City of London, [London] : 1660.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "May 3". Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Goldsmiths' Library, London.
the Honourable City of London
James Flesher
